title: Building sites abutting railway track boundary - Subject to the requirements of set-backs from roads
clause_text: Building sites abutting railway track boundary - Subject to the requirements of set-backs from roads and side and rear marginal open spaces under the relevant Regulations, no new construction of a building or reconstruction of an existing building shall be allowed
section: Height restrictions in the vicinity of aerodromes
